page.title: 12RECREATION - GOLF COURSES
page.content: {POLLOK - }Opened in l892. It's opening times are 8.30 a.m. till dark. It has a bar and a cafe. Joining fee and lst year subscription is Â£700; and thereafter the annual subscription is Â£259. Only the 460 male members are allowed to play golf on the course. (In Pollok Estate). {COWGLEN -} Annual membership fee is Â£l00 and there is also an Â£86 junior membership (4 yrs). Junior members are only allowed in on Monday, Friday, Saturday and Sunday. The club also has 2 bars, one in which you must wear a tie. {HAGGS CASTLE - }Is the venue for the Glasgow Open. There are over l000 members. It covers l20 acres and the membership subscription is Â£l95. Non members are only allowed to play when accompanied by a member. (In Pollok Estate).
